H0.text: On which racecourse is the Welsh Grand National run each December. Ffos Las

H1.text: On which racecourse is the Welsh Grand National run each December. Bangor-on-Dee

H2.text: On which racecourse is the Welsh Grand National run each December. Haydock Park

H3.text: On which racecourse is the Welsh Grand National run each December. Chepstow

A4.text: The Coral Welsh Grand National is run at Chepstow, Wales
